original_text: I told all the people to come together at the river that runs towards Ahava. We stayed there for three days. I saw that there were Jewish people and priests, but I did not see any Levites.
korean_text: 내가 무리를 아하와로 흐르는 강 가에 모으고 거기서 삼 일 동안 장막에 머물며 백성과 제사장들을 살핀즉 그 중에 레위 자손이 한 사람도 없는지라

sentences.original_text: I told all the people to come together
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 모든 사람들에게 함께 모이라고 말했다

sentences.original_text: at the river that runs towards Ahava
We stayed there for three days
I saw that there were Jewish people and priests
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 유대인들과 제사장들이 있는 것을 보았다

sentences.original_text: but I did not see any Levites
